title: Meta adds parental controls for AI-teen interactions
description: By BARBARA ORTUTAY Meta is adding parental controls for kids’ interactions with artificial intelligence chatbots — including the ability to turn off one-on-one chats with AI characters altogether — beginning early next year. But parents won’t be able to turn off Meta’s AI assistant, which Meta says will “will remain available to offer helpful information […]

title: Generative Artificial Intelligence: a threat, an opportunity or both? (Opinion)
description: Is generative AI like the genie in the bottle? How will it shape our society? Will it bring good fortune, chaos — or maybe both?
content:

title: What the dot-com bubble can teach investors worried about AI
description: There are several lessons learned from the most recent tech bubble of the late 1990s that can help guide through the uncertainty ahead when it comes to artificial intelligence.

title: ASTRI Showcases Six Innovative Technologies at InnoCarnival
description: HONG KONG, Oct. 18, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (ASTRI) is featuring six groundbreaking technologies and smart solutions at this year's InnoCarnival. Spanning artificial intelligence (AI), smart mobility, medtech, contech and intelligent manufacturing, these innovations allow visitors to experience the transformative power of technology first-hand.

title: The Rise of Generative AI: How It’s Reshaping Technology and Everyday Life
description: In the past decade, artificial intelligence (AI) has transitioned from a futuristic concept to a powerful force driving innovation across industries.
